column4: I just installed ubuntu server 6.06 and now it's finished, the login comes up, but no keyboards will work no matter what!  I picked the default keyboard layout and actually did the install..
I can run the install utility keyboard works fine.. as soon as you get to login no keyboard
have you tried a newer version?, 6.06 seems broken on a lot of new servers lately
its the last (and first) long time support version, the latest is 7.10
